name: serialazy-bson
description: A TypeScript class serialization library (BSON backend)

scripts.clean_all: npm run clean_lib && npm run clean_spec
scripts.build_all: npm run build_lib && npm run build_spec
scripts.test: npm run build_lib && npm run build_spec && node ./spec/bin/run.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run clean_all && npm run build_all && node ./spec/bin/run.js

author: Andrey Tselischev <vorteq@gmail.com>
